short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lead Finder is an extension that allows you to export leads from LinkedIn with their email addresses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export leads from LinkedIn Sales Navigator with their email addresses. You can export leads as a .csv file, and then upload them to a campaign in Emailchaser.
